summary: West Bromwich Albion, often called West Brom, is an English football club based in West Bromwich. They play in the EFL Championship, the second-highest league in England. The club was founded in 1878 and has a rich history, including being one of the first professional football leagues' founding members. They've won the English championship once and the FA Cup five times. Their home ground, The Hawthorns, has been their base since 1900. The team's colors are navy blue and white stripes, and their badge features a throstle bird. They have local rivalries with Aston Villa and Wolverhampton Wanderers.
title: West Bromwich Albion F.C.
